casebody.data:
Ray WHITLEY, Clarice Ohle and Todd Ohle
v.
William R. HORTON, Chambers Food & Spirits, LLC, and DFI Group, Inc. No. 150P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. Stephen W. Petersen, Raleigh, for Whitley, et al. W. Rickert Hinnant, Winston-Salem, for Horton, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 15th day of March 2005 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2005."
